text: Riolo Terme is a comune in the Province of Ravenna in the Emilia-Romagna region in Italy. It is about southeast of Bologna and about southwest of Ravenna. The main attraction are the thermal baths. == History == Until 1957, it was known as Riolo dei Bagni (Riolo of the Baths). == Geography == Riolo Terme is next to these municipalities: Borgo Tossignano, Brisighella, Casola Valsenio, Castel Bolognese, Faenza and Imola.
